column2:
%FileName%.%FileExtension%
    Path........:  %FolderName%
    Date........:  %File_Modified_Date%
    Created.....:  %File_Created_Date%
    Size........:  %FileSize/String3% \[%FileSize% bytes\]
_____________________________________________________________________
    Format......: %FileExtension% | %Format%$if(%Audio_Codec_List%, | %Audio_Codec_List%,)$if(%InternetMediaType%, | %InternetMediaType%,)$if(%Format_Profile%, | %Format_Profile%,)
    Time........: %Duration/String2% \[%Duration/String3%\]
    BitRate.....:  %OverallBitRate/String% \(%OverallBitRate_Mode%\) \[%OverallBitRate%\]
    Header......: %StreamSize/String5% \[%StreamSize% bytes\][
    Writing App.:  %Encoded_Application%]
[
    Album.......: %Album%]$if(%Album/Performer%,
    Album.Artist: %Album/Performer%,)[
    Artist......: %Performer%][
    Title.......: %Track%]$if(%Part/Position%,
    Disc.#......: %Part/Position% / %Part/Position_Total%,)[
    Year/Date...: %Recorded_Date%][
    Genre.......: %Genre%][
    Track.#.....: %Track/Position%$if(%Track/Position_Total%,/%Track/Position_Total%,)]$if(%Comment%,\(%Comment%\), )$if(%Publisher%,
    Label.......: %Publisher%,)$if(%Producer%,
  Producer....: %Producer%,)$if(%RemixedBy%,
    Remixed by..: %RemixedBy%,)$if(%BPM%,
   BPM.........: %BPM%,)$if(%Rating%,
    Rating......: %Rating%,)$if(%Composer%,
    Composer....: %Composer%,)$if(%Copyright%,
    Copyright...: %Copyright%,)$if(%ISRC%,
    ISRC........: %ISRC%,)$if(%CatalogNumber%,
    Catalog.#...: %CatalogNumber%,)$if(%Comment%,
    Comment.....: %Comment%,)
    Cover Art...: $if(%Cover%,%Cover%,No)$if(%Cover_Description%, \(%Cover_Description%\),)$if(%Cover_Mime%, \[%Cover_Mime%\],)

VIDEO[
    Title............:  %Title%]
    Duration.........:  %Duration/String3% \(%FrameCount% frames\)
    Codec............:  %CodecID% \([%CodecID/Hint% / ]%Encoded_Library/Name%\)[ \(Str.%ID%\)][ \(ID: %UniqueID%\)]
    Format (Profile).:  %Format% \(%Format_Profile%[ / %Format_Settings_RefFrames% Ref.Fr.]\)
    Dimensions.......:  %Width% x %Height% px
    Aspect Ratio.....:  %DisplayAspectRatio/String%[ \(%DisplayAspectRatio%\)][ / Pixel A.R.: %PixelAspectRatio%]
    FrameRate........:  %FrameRate/String%[ \(%FrameRate_Mode%\)][ \(%FrameRate_Minimum% fps » %FrameRate_Maximum% fps\)][
    FrameRate Mode...:  %FrameRate_Mode/String%]
    BitRate..........:  $if(%BitRate%,%BitRate/String%,%BitRate_Nominal/String%)[
    ScanType.........:  %ScanType/String%]
    Bits \(px*fr\).....:  %Bits-(Pixel*Frame)%[
    Bitdepth.........:  %BitDepth% bits][
    ColorSpace.......:  %ColorSpace%][
    ChromaSubsampling:  %ChromaSubsampling%][
    Delay............:  %Delay% ms][
    Stream Size......:  %StreamSize/String5%][
    Writing Lib......:  %Encoded_Application%][
    W.Library........:  %Encoded_Library/Name% - %Encoded_Library/Version%][
    W.Settings.......:  %Encoded_Library_Settings%][
    Matrix/BVOP/QPel/GMC: %Format_Settings_Matrix% • %Format_Settings_BVOP% • %Format_Settings_QPel% • %Format_Settings_GMC/String%]$if(%Encoded_Date%,
    Date \(enc./tag\)..:  %Encoded_Date% | %Tagged_Date%,[
    Date \(tag\).......:  %Tagged_Date%])

AUDIO[
    Title............:  %Title%][
    Language.........:  %Language/String% \(%Language/String3%\)]
    Stream Count.....:  %StreamCount%[ \(Str.%ID%\)][ \(ID: %UniqueID%\)]
    Duration.........:  %Duration/String3%
    Format...........:  %Format%[ \(%Format/Info%\)][ \(%CodecID/Hint%\)][ \(%CodecID%\)][
    Profile..........:  %Format_Profile%][ • %Format_Version%][ • %Format_Settings%][ • SBR: %Format_Settings_SBR%][ • PS: %Format_Settings_PS%]
    BitRate/Channel..:  $if(%BitRate%,%BitRate/String%,%BitRate_Nominal/String%) \($if(%BitRate_Mode%,%BitRate_Mode%,xBR)\) / %Channel(s)% ch
    Sampling \(Res.\)..:  %SamplingRate/String%[ \(%Resolution/String%\)][
    Interl./Preload..:  %Interleave_Duration/String% • %Interleave_Preload/String%][
    Delay/Video......:  %Delay% ms][ / %Video_Delay% ms][
    Stream Size......:  %StreamSize/String5%][
    W.Library........:  %Encoded_Library%][
    W.Settings.......:  %Encoded_Library_Settings%]$if(%Encoded_Date%,
    Date \(enc./tag\)..:  %Encoded_Date% | %Tagged_Date%,[
    Date \(tag\).......:  %Tagged_Date%])
